briefTitle: Study on Safety and Efficacy of an Oral Contraceptive in Long Cycles
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open, Randomized, Parallel Group Comparison to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of the Oral Contraceptive SH T00186D (0.02 mg Ethinylestradiol as Betadex Clathrate and 3 mg Drospirenone) in Two Variations of an Extended Regimen vs. a Standard Regimen (24 + 4 Days) in 1122 Healthy Female Volunteers for One Year, Followed by a One Year Safety Extension

interventions.name: Fixed extended treatment of EE20/DRSP (YAZ, BAY86-5300)

arms.label: Fixed extended treatment of EE20/DRSP (YAZ, BAY86-5300)

summary: The purpose of the study is to determine safety and efficacy of long-cycle regimens of an oral contraceptive.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Days With Bleeding Including Spotting

effectByArm.arm: Fixed Extended Treatment of EE20/DRSP (YAZ, BAY86-5300)
